  • Method Details

    • isValidToken

      private boolean isValidToken(Class<?> token)
      Return true if token is valid to implement

      Token isn't valid, if it's

      • Primitive type
      • Array type
      • Enum type
      • Has private modifier
      • Has final modifier
      Parameters:
      token - type token to create implementation for.
      Returns:
      true if token valid else return false

    • implement

      public void implement(Class<?> token, Path root) throws ImplerException
      Generate code of realizable class and write to the file
      Specified by:
      implement in interface Impler
      Parameters:
      token - type token to create implementation for.
      root - root directory.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - if isValidToken(token) returns false or IO exception was handled

    • getPathToClass

      private Path getPathToClass(Class<?> token, Path root) throws IOException
      Create parent directory and return Path to output file Using File.separatorChar as separator in path
      Parameters:
      token - type token to create implementation for.
      root - root directory
      Returns:
      Path to output file
      Throws:
      IOException - if create directory was failed

    • isValidArgs

      private static boolean isValidArgs(String[] args)
      Check if given arguments is valid.

      Expected two or three arguments. If got three arguments, then check if third is "-jar" Default usage of this function is check command line arguments.

      Parameters:
      args - arguments
      Returns:
      true if arguments is valid else return false

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args) throws ImplerException, ClassNotFoundException
      Run implementor with command line arguments Has two type of work:
      • Expected two arguments: classname and path to output file. Write realization of class to output file
      • Expected three arguments: "-jar", classname and path to .jar file Write realization of class, convert it to .jar file and put it on path to .jar file
      Parameters:
      args - command line arguments
      Throws:
      ImplerException - if catch IO exception or compilation in .jar mode was failed
      ClassNotFoundException - if default ClassLoader can't load class with arguments name

    • implementJar

      public void implementJar(Class<?> token, Path jarFile) throws ImplerException
      Generate .jar file, contains compiled realization of token

      Based on implement(Class, Path)

      Specified by:
      implementJar in interface JarImpler
      Parameters:
      token - type token to create implementation for.
      jarFile - target .jar file.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - if IO exception was thrown or compilation was failed

    • compileFile

      public static void compileFile(Class<?> token, Path root, String file) throws ImplerException
      Compile file

      Based on Georgiy Korneev code.

      Parameters:
      token - type token to create implementation for.
      root - root directory
      file - to compile file
      Throws:
      ImplerException - if compilation was failed or can't load classpath
